name: Salt of the Earth
description:
This game was created in 7 days for the 2019 Epic MegaJam.

Music generously created for this project by tfx: https://saltmonger.itch.io/
Special thanks to all those involved who shared their touching stories and
experiences with me, which served as the inspiration for this project.

If you have any thoughts, comments, or stories you'd like to share,
I'd love to hear from you.
